required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Descriptive Observational Epidemiological Study on the Characteristics of Thyroid Cancer in Patients Treated in Oncology Services of Spanish Centers: National Registry of Thyroid Cancer - Differentiated, Medullary and Anaplastic

brief_summary.textblock: An epidemiological, observational, multicenter, cross-sectional, retrospective study on patients ≥ 18 years visited in the oncology services of the participating centers with diagnosis of primary thyroid cancer.

primary_outcome.description: Based on pathologist evaluation of biopsy including differentiated, medullar or anaplasic.

primary_outcome.measure: Situation of the tumor at first-diagnosis
primary_outcome.description: Local tumor, locoregional tumor or metastatic disease.
Based on the AJCC (American Joint Committee on Cancer) 2018 TNM system: T for extent or size of the tumor, N for lymph nodes spread and M for metastasis.
From I to IV, based on the interpretation of the TNM classification and depending on the hystopathological characteristics of the tumor.

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient situation at the end of treatment
secondary_outcome.description: Results of clinical evaluation of the disease including complete response, partial response, stable disease, progression of disease or death

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with BRAF mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on BRAF status and proportion of patients with mutated BRAF or native BRAF.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with RET mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on RET status and proportion of patients with mutated RET or native RET.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with PI3K mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on PI3K status and proportion of patients with mutated PI3K or native PI3K.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with RAS mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on RAS status and proportion of patients with mutated RAS or native RAS.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with PAX8/PAR mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on PAX8/PAR status and proportion of patients with mutated PAX8/PAR or native PAX8/PAR.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with P53 mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on P53 status and proportion of patients with mutated P53 or native P53.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with PTEN mutation
secondary_outcome.description: Total patients with available results on PTEN status and proportion of patients with mutated PTEN or native PTEN.

study_pop.textblock: Patients ≥ 18 years visited in the oncology services of the participating centers that have a diagnosis of primary cancer located in the thyroid gland.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients older than 18 years with diagnosis of differentiated, medullary or anaplastic thyroid cancer confirmed by histopathology.
- Patients who agree to participate and are able to understand the information sheet and sign the informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients under 18 years of age.
- Patients with other types of thyroid cancer or whose histopathological diagnosis has not been confirmed.
- Patients who do not have the relevant basic information to be included in the study, according to the criteria of the principal investigator.
